mapper.insert: insert into suho_cart (cart_id, user_id, goods_id, amount) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{goods_id}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update suho_cart set amount=#{amount} where cart_id=#{cart_id}
mapper.select: select cart_id, g.goods_id goods_id, u.user_id user_id, u.name user_name, g.name goods_name, img goods_img, amount, price goods_price, price*amount money from suho_user u, suho_cart c, suho_goods g where u.user_id=c.user_id and c.goods_id=g.goods_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} order by cart_id
